TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class StateBag : System.Collections.IDictionary, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StateBag extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class StateBag Implements IDictionary, IStateManager
public ref class StateBag sealed : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type StateBag = class interface IStateManager interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態 (包括網頁)。

span.span: Manages the view state of ASP.NET server controls, including pages.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 累積的屬性值或檢視中，該頁面或控制項的頁面或控制項的檢視狀態。View state for a page or control is the cumulative property values, or view, of that page or control. 您可以存取這個類別可透過屬性。You can access this class through the property. 控制項也可以儲存在控制項狀態的基本狀態資訊但資訊不會儲存為物件。Controls can also store essential state information in control state, but that information is not stored as a object. 這個類別是所有的 HTML 和 Web 伺服器控制項的主要儲存體機制。This class is the primary storage mechanism for all HTML and Web server controls. 它會屬性/值配對儲存為與控制項關聯的字串。It stores attribute/value pairs as strings associated with the control. 它會追蹤這些屬性變更之後才方法執行頁面要求，並將變更儲存到頁面或控制項的檢視狀態。It tracks changes to these attributes only after the method is executed for a page request, and saves the changes to the page's or control's view state. 這個類別所實作的字典，以及您可以加入項目，或從中移除項目，如同任何字典物件。This class implements a dictionary, and you can add items to it or remove items from it as you would any dictionary object. 如需有關資料的集合，例如字典，請參閱[集合和資料結構](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about data collections, such as dictionaries, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範複合`Label`控制項，其`Text`和`FontSize`屬性。The following code example demonstrates a composite `Label` control that has `Text` and `FontSize` properties. 這些屬性會儲存並擷取從檢視狀態時控制項上呼叫方法。These properties are saved to and retrieved from view state when the method is called on the control. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the value of an item stored in the object.
The specified item in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個成員是最簡單的方式來儲存和擷取控制項或頁面檢視狀態的值。Using this member is the simplest way to save and retrieve view-state values for a control or a page. 如果項目已不會儲存在時設定這個屬性時，其索引鍵/值組加入至集合的物件。If an item is not already stored in the object when you set this property, its key/value pair is added to the collection. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`null`之前項目上呼叫方法，則會移除從物件。If you set this property to `null` before the method is called on an item, it is removed from the object. 否則，當您將這個屬性設定為`null`金鑰會儲存追蹤項目的檢視狀態。Otherwise, when you set this property to `null` the key is saved to allow tracking of the item's view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將其名稱和值儲存為索引鍵/值組的屬性屬性。The following code example demonstrates a property that saves its name and value as a key/value pair to the property. 屬性是的執行個體類別。The property is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示 物件中項目的索引鍵集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys representing the items in the object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些索引鍵是控制項屬性的名稱。These keys are the names of the control properties. 比方說，如果您建立`BGColor`上的屬性`Table`自訂時，控制項`BGColor`代表該屬性在這個集合中建立項目您`Table`控制項。For example, if you created a `BGColor` property on a `Table` control that you customized, a `BGColor` entry is created in this collection representing that property on your `Table` control. 這些索引鍵對應的名稱中儲存的物件目前的頁面或伺服器控制項的集合。These keys correspond to the names of the objects stored in the collection for the current page or server control. 您可以逐一查看這個集合使用方法。You can iterate over this collection using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/CS/gotocs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/VB/gotovb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 還原先前已儲存的 物件檢視狀態。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會還原檢視狀態資訊物件所儲存的先前頁面要求方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 您可以覆寫此方法，以控制的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。You can override this method to control how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() cil managed
Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來 物件的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的物件。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the .

returns.span: 如果沒有任何變更，或是 中沒有任何 項目，這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there are no changes, or there are no elements in the , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放在伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 儲存檢視狀態時，此字串物件會傳回給用戶端做此變數會儲存在 HTML`Hidden`項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)並[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 導致 物件追蹤其狀態的變更，以便可以跨要求持續保存。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its state so that it can be persisted across requests.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得儲存於 物件中的檢視狀態值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the view-state values stored in the object.
The collection of view-state values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是包含的所有值的集合中指定的頁面或控制項的物件。This is a collection that contains the values for all the objects in the specified page or control. 您可以逐一查看這些值使用方法。You can iterate through these values by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/CS/gotocs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/VB/gotovb.aspx#2)]
